summary: This small mod rearranges the speech perk tree.
descriptionHtml:
This mod simply rearranges some of the perks in the vanilla Skyrim Speechcraft perk tree. The changes are:

Investor - Now available at Speech Level 50. Preq: Allure Perk
Merchant - Now available at Speech Level 70. Preq: Investor Perk
Master Trader - Now available at Speech Level 90. Preq: Merchant Perk
Fence - Now available at Speech Level 100. Preq: Master Trader Perk

This mod was inspired by my friend whom I shared his opinion that the Speechcraft perk tree was a little out of order. We felt that Merchant and Fence should be later game Speech investment instead of mid-game.
author: CaptKaelus
